attributes.action: Provide free solar panels. Household will return surplus energy to grid for free
attributes.additional_details: Heavy reliance on privatised power companies needs to be solved.
attributes.background:
Instead of providing energy grants, empower the consumers to generate energy.
Solve the energy problem for a long term.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613855
